name: battery cell production, Li-ion, LiMn2O4 | battery cell, Li-ion, LiMn2O4 | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7891/documentation

The dataset can be used as a cathode for a lithium-ion battery. Data are based on patents. For infrastructure, the ecoinvent dataset "chemical plant, organics" is accounted. Transportation efforts are based on ecoinvent standard estimates.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



This dataset incudes the production of a single cell for a lithium ion battery. Cathode, anode and a seperator are calendared. An aluminium electrode tab is added. The singel cells are filled with electrolyte (LiPF6 in ethylencarbonate) in an inert atmosphere and packed up in a polyethylene envelope.  For infrastructure, the ecoinvent dataset "chemical plant, organics" is accounted. Transportation efforts are based on ecoinvent standard estimates.
category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/272:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators/2720:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Some European datasets are used for global processes.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: This dataset includes a method of producing a lithium ion single cell. Lithium ion move from the cathode (LiMn2O4) into the electrolyte (LiPF6 in ethylenecarbonate) through the micropores of the sepeartor into the anode (lithium ion intercalation). During the charging phase. During the discharge of the battery the Li+-ions move back into the cathode.
